pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President of the European Council Donald Tusk | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Trudeau spoke with Donald Tusk, President of the European Council.

The Prime Minister and the President discussed the European Union – China Summit that will take place next week. Prime Minister Trudeau also raised with President Tusk the ongoing Canadian consular cases in China. The two leaders underscored the importance of respecting the rule of law, upholding the independence of the judiciary, and promoting human rights. 

Prime Minister Trudeau and President Tusk discussed the ongoing crisis in Venezuela, reiterating their commitment to support the Venezuelan people and a peaceful resolution of the situation. 

The two leaders also discussed ongoing developments with respect to Brexit. Prime Minister Trudeau emphasized Canada’s deep relationship with both the United Kingdom and other European Union Member States.
